attributes.action: They earned it: Medals cost-free to those who have been awarded them
attributes.additional_details:
2014 marks the 100th anniversary of WW1. Members of the services, armed and emergency, must be allowed to receive their awarded medals cost free.

Despite being awarded a medal or badge, service members, past and present, have to pay for these physical items to come into their possession - some costing £50. They should not have to pay for this. They earned it.
